name: date
description: The date of the persons activity summary.

name: activity_calories
description: The number of calories burned for the day during periods the user was active above sedentary level. This includes both activity burned calories and BMR.

name: calories_bmr
description: Total BMR calories burned for the day.

name: calories_out
description: Total calories burned for the day.

name: elevation
description: The elevation traveled for the day displayed in the units defined by the data source. When src_id is 'vibrent', the unit is feet. When src_id is 'ce', the unit is meters.

name: fairly_active_minutes
description: Total minutes the user was fairly/moderately active.

name: floors
description: The floors provides ONLY the count of how many floors the Fitbit device counted as the user ascended in elevation. The researcher can determine how many feet or meters the user climbed as the device determines a floor every time the user ascends 10 feet (3 meters). Essentially 1 Floor = 10 Feet (3 Meters).

name: lightly_active_minutes
description: Total minutes the user was lightly active.

name: marginal_calories
description: Total marginal estimated calories burned for the day.

name: sedentary_minutes
description: Total minutes the user was sedentary.

name: steps
description: Total steps taken for the day.

name: very_active_minutes
description: Total minutes the user was very active.

name: person_id
description: A foreign key identifier to the person for whom the data was recorded.
